title: Dreams
description: What happens when you fall in love with a figment of your imagination?Cheli is an ordinary girl living an ordinary life, when she meets the perfect guy, Matt. The catch? She meets him in a dream.Struggling to balance her real life with her dream reality, Cheli and Matt continue to meet in her dreams and she finds herself falling in love with him.How can a relationship feel so real when the very foundation it’s based on is not? How can Cheli cope when the man she loves doesn’t really exist? Or does he?
author: Sian Ceinwen
